R

randomWeapon() - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.SmallGun
This Weapon randomWeapon randomly generates the various guns across the game and in the shop; there are 50 Types of Guns from which a random selection can occur.
randomWeapon() - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.Sword
This Weapon randomWeapon randomly generates the various swords across the game and in the shop; there are 50 Types of Sword from which a random selection can occur.
randomWeapon() - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.Weapon
This Draw Method is passed down Graphics g; various mathematical computations are made for the random weapon to be selected.

This GameRunner Class extends JPanel, which is used for the screens, and implements KeyListener, an important facet for the whole game.

This GameRunner Class extends JPanel, which is used for the screens, and implements KeyListener, an important facet for the whole game.
reset() - Method in class pyramid.plunder.GameRunner
This reset method defines various items, such as frame, timer, timerSpeed, shader, lastRunTime, money, startMoney, coinBarSpinNum, coinSpinTime, fadeBackTime, weapons, and bufferedImage.
resetAll() - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.GameRunner
This resetAll method defines various items, such as frame, time, drawables, worldFrame, playerkey, collidables, money, startMoney, fadeBackTime, and weapons.
